titleStmt.title: Euodias and Syntyche, or, The female zelots [sic] of the church of Philippi mis-led, mis-guided, seduced by those of the concision, those evill workers of the said church : set forth in a sermon at Brent-wood, in Essex, Febru. 28, 1636, at the metropoliticall visitation of the most reverend Father in God, William, Lord Arch-bishop of Canterbury / by Iohn Elborrovv, vicar of S. Pancras, alias, Kentish-towne by London.
titleStmt.author: Elborow, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.F. for John Clark, and are to be sold at his Shop under S. Peters Church in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of originals in: British Library and Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Includes bibliographical references in marginal notes.

place.placeName: his Shop under S. Peters Church in Cornhill
